Equator Trustees Limited is licensed by the Seychelles Financial Services Authority (FSA) as a Corporate and Trustee Service Provider, and has offices in Victoria, the capital city of Seychelles on the island of Mahe. Our principals are experienced in the provision of legal services, company and trust formation and administration. We offer an efficient and friendly service to our clients, and are willing to go the extra mile to satisfy their needs.

Our staff of internationally qualified professionals have vast experience in the fields of company formation and administration, as well as offshore banking.

We offer a wide range of products and services to both individual and corporate clients internationally, and have established a wide network of professional contacts in the legal, accountancy and business fields.

Through our solid relationships with local banks and accountants, we are able to offer clients “add-on” services to suit their particular requirements.

We do not provide taxation or legal advice other than inasmuch as it relates to Seychelles. Clients should seek advice in their country of residence, in particular with regard to taxation.
